t: Amazon.com: Little Tikes - My First Flyer : Toys & Games
s: I see a wide variety in people's reviews, so I'd like to share my own experience. My kids are ages 3 and 5. I have a few other small indoor helicopters geared for big kids/adults (Syma brand), which are too hard for my kids to operate. When I saw the Little Tikes, I thought it was worth a try.

t: Little Tikes My First Drone Toy
s: We first tried it in the house and immediately smashed itself into the 16’ ceiling. We decided ok, this is an outdoors only toy. It was a pretty windless day out so we fired the drone up and watched as it took off 10-20’ in the air at which point it was still accelerating like a rocket ship. At around 300’ we lost sight of the lil guy but it was still climbing like a fighter jet. I’d assume it’s on its way back to Little Tikes ...
